title: THE YOUTH’S DREAM.
content: “I HAVE dreamed a dream of a future time, Of a scepter and a crown, For the sheaves of wheat and the moon and stars In my dream to me bow down.” ’Twas a vision true, as the future proved, For the boy, once sold a slave, By a faithful life rose to princely power, And the world its homage gave. Have you dreamed a dream of a future time, Of a fortune and a name? Of success and honor and love and joy, And at last undying fame? If your dream comes true you must toil and strive With a purpose strong and pure, For the kingly heart and the godly life Wins a crown that shall endure.

book.title: A Little Colored Boy and Other Stories
book.description: 简介： I think it more likely that God put an angels voice in Neddys throat to give us a taste of heavenly music, said grandma, looking up from the apples she was paring....
